list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add shadow parameters to US-UTJ config and fix Jupyter notebook
Updated the US-UTJ.ini configuration to include shadow_start and shadow_end parameters. Additionally, truncated the Jupyter notebook DL_test.ipynb to eliminate excessive overhead and improve usability. These changes enhance config flexibility and streamline the notebook structure.

change.beforePath: $PROJECT_DIR$/Notebooks/Processing Workflow Notebooks/Pull DB Data and Impute.ipynb
change.afterPath: $PROJECT_DIR$/Notebooks/Processing Workflow Notebooks/Pull DB Data and Impute.ipynb

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Python tests.Python tests for converter_test.test_dataframe_from_file.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for footprint_tests.test_calc_footprint_values.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for footprint_tests.test_coordinate_system.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for footprint_tests.test_different_stability_conditions.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for meteolib_tests.TestEvaporationComparisons.test_radiation_limits.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for meteolib_tests.TestVaporPressure.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for test_converter.test_data_preprocessing.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in converter_test.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in ffp_tests.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in footprint_tests.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in meteolib_tests.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in outlier_removal_tests.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in spectral-tests.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in spectral_tests_2.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in test_converter.py.executor": "Run", "Python.spectral_tests_2.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.OpenProjectViewOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "C:/Users/paulinkenbrandt/Documents/GitHub/MicroMet", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "run.code.analysis.last.selected.profile": "pProject Default", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "preferences.pluginManager", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary:
Add 'secrets' and 'station_data' to .gitignore
The commit introduces two new entries to the .gitignore file. The '/secrets/' and '/station_data/' directories are now ignored to prevent sensitive or unnecessary data from being tracked by git.

Simplify environment.yml and add pyproject.toml
Removed unnecessary channels and dependencies in `environment.yml`. Updated the project description in `setup.py`. Introduced `pyproject.toml` for modern dependency and build management, outlining project metadata and dependencies, including optional development packages.

Add Flux variables CSV and enhance micromet functionality
Added a comprehensive CSV file for Flux variables, enhancing data tracking. Updated multiple scripts in the micromet package to improve configuration handling, CSV path management, and file compilation. Moreover, introduced new dependencies in the environment file and pyproject.toml to support enhanced data visualization and statistical analysis features.

Add Flux variables CSV and enhance micromet functionality
Added a comprehensive CSV file for Flux variables, enhancing data tracking. Updated multiple scripts in the micromet package to improve configuration handling, CSV path management, and file compilation. Moreover, introduced new dependencies in the environment file and pyproject.toml to support enhanced data visualization and statistical analysis features.

Moreover, introduced new dependencies in the environment file and pyproject.toml to support enhanced data visualization and statistical analysis features.
Consolidated and eliminated uneccessary files

Consolidated and eliminated uneccessary files

Moreover, introduced new dependencies in the environment file and pyproject.toml to support enhanced data visualization and statistical analysis features.
Consolidated and eliminated uneccessary files

Add Flux variables CSV and enhance micromet functionality
Added a comprehensive CSV file for Flux variables, enhancing data tracking. Updated multiple scripts in the micromet package to improve configuration handling, CSV path management, and file compilation. Moreover, introduced new dependencies in the environment file and pyproject.toml to support enhanced data visualization and statistical analysis features.
Consolidated and eliminated uneccessary files

Add Flux variables CSV and enhance micromet functionality
Added a comprehensive CSV file for Flux variables, enhancing data tracking. Updated multiple scripts in the micromet package to improve configuration handling, CSV path management, and file compilation. Moreover, introduced new dependencies in the environment file and pyproject.toml to support enhanced data visualization and statistical analysis features.
Consolidated and eliminated uneccessary files

Add functions to detect and plot data gaps in tools.py
Added new functions `find_gaps` and `plot_gaps` to `tools.py` for detecting and visualizing missing data periods in time series datasets. Updated imports and provided example usage. Additionally, adjusted paths and configurations in the workspace setup and optimized dependencies in the notebook.

Delete outdated documentation and spectral analysis modules.
Removed obsolete files: `converter_docs.rst`, `meteolib-docs.rst`, `specplot.py`, and `spectral.py`. This cleanup is part of a broader effort to streamline the project and ensure only relevant, up-to-date documentation and modules are preserved.

Improve DL_test.ipynb by updating content significantly.
The notebook was heavily modified to reduce its overall size from over 17,000 lines to just under 400. This streamlining likely involved removing unnecessary code, outputs, or data, which would help in enhancing performance and readability.

Refactor data compilation logic and optimize imports
Simplified and streamlined the raw data processing workflow for AmeriFlux files. Removed unused imports, adjusted error handling, and ensured output formatting for consistency. Improved plotting by replacing missing values with NaN prior to visualization.

Add shadow parameters to US-UTJ config and fix Jupyter notebook
Updated the US-UTJ.ini configuration to include shadow_start and shadow_end parameters. Additionally, truncated the Jupyter notebook DL_test.ipynb to eliminate excessive overhead and improve usability. These changes enhance config flexibility and streamline the notebook structure.

Add shadow parameters to US-UTJ config and fix Jupyter notebook
